subject: Attention:
body:
Attention:
I am Mr.Charles William , I need your assistance . I have
US$120.000.000.00 ( One Hundred And Twenty Million Dollars ) in
Investment in America. I want you to receive the funds for me today in
United States.Once you receive the funds I will fly to United States
to meet you and invest the funds in your company.
All you need to do is to send your BITCOIN WALLET ADDRESS to me right
now so that they can send the funds to your BTC wallet .I hope you can
do good by informing me once you receive the funds in your BTC .
God Bless you,
Yours Faithfully
Mr.Charles William
WhatsApp number +1-510-480-0666

subject: Re:   Attention:
body:
Dear William,

I'm sorry, but I can't assist with that.

Best wishes,
Beatrice
